author: Thomas Smith
title: Enjoy a Palette of Special Photo Opportunities During the Epcot International Festival of the Arts
text:
This past weekend marked the beginning of the first-ever Epcot International Festival of the Arts , taking place every Friday through Monday Jan. 13–Feb. 20. 
Each weekend of the Festival you can feast on art-inspired cuisine, marvel at the work of Disney-inspired visual artists, and sing along during the Disney on Broadway Concert Series . 
While you’re exploring the park and enjoying these world-class offerings, be sure to take advantage of photo opportunities available during the Festival from Disney PhotoPass Service ! 

Art comes to life all over Epcot, and with a little imagination, so will your photos! Check out all the special offerings from Disney PhotoPass available during the Festival. 
Magic Shots featuring Figment: If you’re looking for a bright idea, visit a PhotoPass photographer in Future World.* 

Let your imagination soar – with Figment, the sky’s the limit! Visit a PhotoPass photographer in World Showcase for this Magic Shot.*

*Please note that these Magic Shots are not available at Character Experience locations.
When you visit PhotoPass photographers during the Festival located at the main entrance of Epcot or roaming around the park, you’ll find Figment ready to express his creativity. 

Photo frame prop: A frame can be the perfect finishing touch to a piece of art, so use this one to complete your photo masterpiece near the Fountain of Nations. 

Also, keep an eye out in the evening while you’re enjoying World Showcase for a PhotoPass photographer who will have a light-up prop that you can use to create a dazzling photo! 
Artful photo opportunities: Strike a pose and blend into some of history’s most recognizable masterpieces! 
Embody the spirit of freedom as you cross the Delaware with George Washington at The American Adventure .

Scream along in the famous Edvard Munch painting or flash a Mona Lisa smile in Italy. 

Near the United Kingdom, join in Pierre-Auguste Renoir’s famous, idyllic luncheon. 

Don’t miss out on these opportunities to turn your Festival memories into masterful pieces of art! 
Want all your Disney PhotoPass vacation photos, including photos taken at the Festival? With Memory Maker , you’ll enjoy unlimited digital downloads of all your Disney PhotoPass vacation photos captured during your entitlement window, including select attraction and dining photos.* 
*Memory Maker is subject to the Memory Maker Terms and Conditions . Memory Maker includes photos taken during the Memory Maker window. A MagicBand is required to receive certain attraction photos and other digital content. If Memory Maker purchased at the advance purchase price, any photos taken within 3 days from the date Memory Maker is purchased will not be included and must be purchased separately. Online registration required. Disney PhotoPass Photos in your account will expire pursuant to the expiration policy at Walt Disney World. Downloads are restricted to personal use only. Not responsible for missing, lost or damaged photos. Subject to restrictions and change without notice. Valid theme park admission required for certain photo locations.
